name: Mekong Delta with Le Cochinchine
description:
Enjoy a
beautiful balance of staying on a comfortable and authentic Mekong delta cruise of Le Cochinchine
while discovering waterways and local life of Mekong Delta. Along the cruise,
you will visit the floating markets, orchards and coconut gardens…Delve
yourself into the aquatic life of the Mekong Delta and live in the romantic
atmosphere of the famous film “The Lover”.
